name: Big Toe Pose
description: Padangusthasana (Big Toe Pose) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Grasp your big toe (or use a strap), lengthening your spine and relaxing your hamstrings.  Benefits include improved balance, flexibility, and stress relief.  Keep your knees slightly bent to avoid strain.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Benefits include stretching hamstrings and spine, calming the mind.  Keep your knees slightly bent, lengthen your spine, and reach for your feet, keeping your head relaxed.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana), Bird of Paradise Pose strengthens legs and core, improves balance and flexibility.  Maintain a straight spine, engage your core, and keep hips square.
